Short Code can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Short Code as integer for Item Name Please enter all the required data Item Name can not be empty for Short Code Please Enter Item Name as character for Short Code Please Enter Item Name as character for Short Code Supply Type can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Supply Type as character for Item Name Rate can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Rate as decimal for Item Name Retail Price can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Retail Price as decimal for Item Name MRP can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter MRP as decimal for Item Name Whole Sale Price can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Whole Sale Price as decimal for Item Name Quantity can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Quantity as decimal for Item Name UOM can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter UOM as character for Item Name Please include following headings in the csv file CGST Rate can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter CGST Rate as decimal for Item Name SGST Rate can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter SGST Rate as decimal for Item Name IGST Rate can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter IGST Rate as decimal for Item Name cess Rate can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter CESS Rate as decimal for Item Name Discount can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Discount as decimal for Item Name Please Enter Favorite as 0 or 1 for Item Name Please Enter active/inactive as 0 or 1 for Item Name Please valid image URL for Item Name Please Enter Item Name Department Code can not be empty for Item Name Please Enter Department Code as integer for Item Name Please Enter Department Code
